about.title: About Cookingdom Game
about.description1: Cookingdom is a super fun, relaxing casual cooking simulation game that lets you experience the joy of cooking in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. It combines simple, intuitive controls with progressively deeper cooking challenges, suitable for players of all ages.
about.description2: The core of the game lies in completing the entire process from preparation to cooking to plating through a series of interactive mini-games. Whether it's chopping vegetables, stirring, controlling heat, or plating decoratively, each step is designed to be easy to pick up and full of fun.
about.description3: As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new recipes, kitchen utensils, and kitchen decorations. You can freely customize your kitchen to create your personalized cooking space. The game has no strict time limits, encouraging you to enjoy the cooking process at your own pace.

step1.title: What is Cookingdom
step1.description: Cookingdom is a relaxing and cozy cooking simulation game that takes you on an unprecedented culinary adventure. By following these tips in Cookingdom, you can quickly become an expert, impressing your friends with your virtual cooking skills. Remember, the goal of Cookingdom is to enjoy the cooking process, so have fun and let your creativity flow!

step2.title: Tutorials and Guidance
step2.description: When you first start Cookingdom, the game provides easy-to-understand tutorials explaining how to perform each cooking task. These tutorials are designed to help you get familiar with the game's controls and mechanics. Whether you're a beginner or just need a refresher, pay attention to these initial guides.

step3.title: Completing Levels
step3.description: Each level in Cookingdom presents a specific dish you need to prepare. Follow the on-screen instructions, complete the mini-games for each step (chopping, stirring, baking, etc.), and aim for the best score. Success is usually measured by accuracy and sometimes speed in the mini-games.

step4.title: Using Guides
step4.description: If you find yourself stuck on a particular level or just want to optimize your cooking process, use the guides provided on this site! We offer step-by-step walkthroughs, tips for tricky mini-games, and video examples to help you master every recipe.

step5.title: Community Interaction
step5.description: Join the Cookingdom community online! Share your kitchen designs, ask for help, and discuss strategies with other players. Check out the links in our footer to connect.

q1.question: Is Cookingdom free to play?
q1.answer: Yes, Cookingdom is free to download and play on both iOS and Android devices. It may offer optional in-app purchases for cosmetic items or minor boosts, but the core gameplay is accessible without spending money.

q2.question: Are the guides on this site official?
q2.answer: No, this is an unofficial fansite created by enthusiasts. The guides and information are based on player experience and community knowledge. While we strive for accuracy, always refer to official game resources if needed.

q3.question: How often are the guides updated?
q3.answer: We aim to keep the guides updated with major game changes or new level releases. However, as a fan project, updates depend on volunteer time and community contributions. Check back regularly!

q4.question: Can I contribute to the guides?
q4.answer: We love community contributions! If you have tips, corrections, or video walkthroughs, please reach out through our contact page or social media links (Discord/Reddit in the footer). We'll review and credit contributions.

tips.title: Cookingdom Cooking Tips and Tricks
tips.description: Master these tips to make your kitchen career more efficient and easily earn three-star ratings!
tips.tip1_text: Faster stoves and larger pots can significantly reduce cooking time.
tips.tip2_text: While waiting for one dish to finish, you can prepare ingredients for the next one.
tips.tip3_text: Completing orders quickly and accurately earns more tips and good reviews.
tips.tip4_text: Place frequently used equipment in convenient locations.
tips.tip5_text: Events often offer generous rewards to help you level up faster.
